property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the DocumentPreference (a Application or Document).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: pageHeight
property.shortdesc: The height of the page.

property.name: pageWidth
property.shortdesc: The width of the page.

property.name: pageOrientation
property.shortdesc: The page orientation.

property.name: columnGuideColor
property.shortdesc: The color of the column guides, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values,, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: marginGuideColor
property.shortdesc: The color of the margin guides, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255, representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: createPrimaryTextFrame
property.shortdesc: If true, the document A-master has primary text frames when a new document is created.

property.name: pagesPerDocument
property.shortdesc: The number of pages in the document. (Range: 1 to 9999)

property.name: facingPages
property.shortdesc: If true, the document has facing pages.

property.name: documentBleedTopOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the top document bleed.

property.name: documentBleedBottomOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the bottom document bleed. Note: To set the bleed bottom offset, document bleed uniform size must be false.

property.name: documentBleedInsideOrLeftOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the inside or left document bleed. Note: To set the bleed inside or left offset, document bleed uniform size must be false.

property.name: documentBleedOutsideOrRightOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the outside or right document bleed. Note: To set the bleed outside or right offset, document bleed uniform size must be false.

property.name: documentBleedUniformSize
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the document bleed top offset value for bleed offset measurements on all sides of the document. The default setting is true.

property.name: slugTopOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the top slug.

property.name: slugBottomOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the bottom slug. Note: To set the slug bottom offset, document slug uniform size must be false.

property.name: slugInsideOrLeftOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the inside or left slug. Note: To set the slug inside or left offset, document slug uniform size must be false.

property.name: slugRightOrOutsideOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the outside or right slug. Note: To set the slug right or outside offset, document slug uniform size must be false.

property.name: documentSlugUniformSize
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the slug top offset value for slug measurements on all sides of the document. The default value is false.

property.name: preserveLayoutWhenShuffling
property.shortdesc: If true, preserves the layout of spreads that contained more than two pages when allow page shuffle was turned on. If false, changes multi-page spreads to two-page spreads if the spreads were created or changed since allow page shuffle was turned on.

property.name: allowPageShuffle
property.shortdesc: If true, guarantees that when pages are added to a spread it will contain a maximum of two pages. If false, allows pages to be added or moved into existing spreads. For override information, see preserve layout when shuffling.

property.name: overprintBlack
property.shortdesc: If true, overprints black when saving the document.

property.name: columnGuideLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, locks column guides.

property.name: startPageNumber
property.shortdesc: The starting page number for a document. This is the same as the starting page number for the first section of a document. Default value is 1.

property.name: intent
property.shortdesc: The intent for a document.

property.name: pageBinding
property.shortdesc: The placement of the page binding.

property.name: columnDirection
property.shortdesc: The direction of text in the column.

property.name: pageSize
property.shortdesc: The size of the page.

property.name: snippetImportUsesOriginalLocation
property.shortdesc: If true, causes UI-based snippet import to use original location for page items.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DocumentPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
